name: TripMentor
0:
”Alexa Open trip mate”
”Alexa Launch trip mate”
”Alexa start trip mate”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trip mate
des:
• The skill 'Trip Mentor' suggests the flights available between two cities on a particular date which will help the user for initial planning of the trips and also shows the list of planned trips for the date input given by the user.
• The skill makes use of Alexa Conversations for better user interactions through Alexa’s artificial intelligence which trains on the data provided which enhances the customer experience.
• 'Alexa open trip mate' will help to start with.
• Can plan a trip by saying ‘plan my trip on Monday or Plan a trip to New York or plan a trip from Los Angeles’.
• Any time we can close the session by saying ‘stop’.
• ‘lets plan later’ can be used for planning later.
• User can see the planned trip by saying ‘show all my trips’.User will be asked to enter date for getting the trip list of particular date .User can say date as 'friday' or 'september twenty fifth'.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
